Text:
ATTENTION! Please download this collection from the other torrent as this one is inaccurate in it's song list. It can be found here: 

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8059871/Nirvana_-_A_Big_Mix_of_Besides_-_Collected_2013

Incidentally, to anybody who grabbed this first attempt at posting this album, be aware that the track Cocaine Girl has been confirmed to NOT be a song by Nirvana and Hole. It is by a band called StageFright and can be found on Youtube. Sorry for the mix-up!
Wow thx sooo much for the "album". Downloaded at 1.3 mb per sec for me and took about 5 mins. Really good guys, perfect for the Nirvana fans out there!
